  • CharEncoding * m_queryCharEncoder
    The CharEncoding object used for converting queries before sending them to the database.

Detailed Description

Encapsulates a connection to a POI SQL database backend.

Creates CharEncSQLQuery, which converts query and result texts between the character encoding systems supplied in the constructor.

Parameters:
